name: Welcome to Emba
description:
Welcome to Emba is an indie game inspired by Frederick Brown's short story Placet Is a Crazy Place.



The action takes place on a tiny planet in endless space. The main character decides to meet his beloved, who was forced to land on the old research base on the eve of the hallucinogenic phase.

It’s a funny, but a little bit strange story that takes literally half an hour: humor, science fiction and distorted reality are waiting for you here!



Welcome to Emba is a narrative-driven platformer combining intense action with puzzles.

  • Enjoy hand-drawn comic art visuals and atmospheric world.
  • Discover beautiful wilderness filled with strange creatures.
  • Watch the transformation of the hero.
  • And the main thing — play absolutely free.
